PoliceStation.text: If you succeed at a Luck (-1) check, then Deputy Dingby absentmindedly leaves you holding his gun. You may search the Common Item deck for a .45 Revolver card and take it.

HibbsRoadhouse.text: Joey "The Rat" Vigil slips into an empty chair at your table and whispers "Pssssst! Wanna buy something?" Look at the top 3 cards of the Common Item deck. You may purchase any or all of them for $1 above list price. "Hey I"ve got overhead!" the Rat explains

VelmasDiner.text: You spot a rat leaving the kitchen. Pass a Will (-2) check to convince Velma to bribe you $5 not to tell anyone.
